titles: A tender visitation and friendly exhortation to all the children of truth to be valiant in this day of trial
author: Brend, William, d. 1676.
notes: Signed: William Brend, from Newgate, London, the 20 of the 11 month, 1664.
Reproduction of original in the Christ Church, Oxford, England.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Charles II, 1660-1685 --  Sources.
